{% include example-intro.html title='Responsive columns' description='The grid is responsive using the mobile-first approach. So you start by defining the column width for the xs screen size, then again for each screen size where you want the column width to change. If you skip a screen size, it will automatically inherit the size from the next smaller size that was specified. For example, .col-xs-12 .col-md-6 would apply 12 column width to sm screens since the next smaller size is .col-xs-12.' %} {% capture example %}
12 columns on XS6 columns on SM4 columns on MD8 columns on LG6 columns on XL
{% endcapture %} {% include example.html code=example %}
